channel.title: CVE Feed for SUSE -- kubewarden
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SUSE -- kubewarden

item.title: CVE-2023-22645|2023-04-19T00:00:00 -- suse -- kubewarden
item.description: An Improper Privilege Management vulnerability in SUSE kubewarden allows attackers to read arbitrary secrets if they get access to the ServiceAccount kubewarden-controller This issue affects: SUSE kubewarden kubewarden-controller versions prior to 1.6.0.
